alert.note: Alert for Menominee; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 26 at 8:22PM CST until February 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 3 and 5 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Menominee and Shawano Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on ice or snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
